task_title: Phase 2: Foundational Types, Errors, and Utils (T010-T017)
task_requirements:
Implement foundational infrastructure for ARTK Core v1:

**Tasks:**
- T010: Create shared types index in core/typescript/types/index.ts
- T011: Create ARTKConfigError class in core/typescript/errors/config-error.ts
- T012: Create ARTKAuthError class in core/typescript/errors/auth-error.ts
- T013: Create ARTKStorageStateError class in core/typescript/errors/storage-state-error.ts
- T014: Create errors barrel export in core/typescript/errors/index.ts
- T015: Create structured logger utility in core/typescript/utils/logger.ts (NFR-001 to NFR-003)
- T016: Create retry utility with exponential backoff in core/typescript/utils/retry.ts (NFR-010 to NFR-012)
- T017: Create utils barrel export in core/typescript/utils/index.ts

**Context Files:**
- specs/001-artk-core-v1/data-model.md (error type definitions in section 3)
- specs/001-artk-core-v1/spec.md (NFR requirements for logging and retry)

**After completing each task:** Update specs/001-artk-core-v1/tasks.md to mark task complete (change [ ] to [x])
